verbs.description: [ARG1: Other areas] [V: were] [ARG2: able to make up slack for an unplanned $ 480 million hit thanks to Presiden't Trump 's new tariffs on imported steel and aluminium] .
[ARG0: Other areas] were able to [V: make] up [ARG1: slack for an unplanned $ 480 million hit] [ARGM-CAU: thanks to Presiden't Trump 's new tariffs on imported steel and aluminium] .
Other areas were able to make up slack for an unplanned $ 480 million hit thanks to Presiden't Trump 's new tariffs on [V: imported] [ARG1: steel] and aluminium .
